member.name: P:Magna.DualTester.Domino.CfgTool.FileName
member.summary: This is the name of the file the settings will be saved to.
member.remarks: Might be a better idea to store and load this string in the app.config

member.name: M:Magna.DualTester.Domino.LoadingDialog.Check(System.String)
member.summary: If the string is null or empty then it gets the green bullet picture. If the string is somthing else return the red bullet picture.
member.remarks: This could be made fancier but I don't feel the need to dive into it.

member.name: F:Magna.DualTester.Domino.TesterApi.Udt_Logvalues.ResultCode
member.summary: 3 = part errors / 2 = part passed / anything else is not defined

member.name: F:Magna.DualTester.Domino.TesterApi.Udt_Opt_Item.Status
member.summary: 0: Nothing 1:Pending 2:Pass 3:Fail 4:Test1 Pass Test2 Pending

member.summary: This is a popup numeric edit box used on the CalibrationSubUserControl

member.summary: This function checks for valid keyboard inputs.
member.remarks: e.Handled makes it so the character is not placed in the textbox.

member.name: P:Magna.DualTester.Domino.UI.Views.Calibration.ViewCalibration.ScreenUnlocked
member.summary: This property controls whether or not the 3 user controls are locked or not. Setting this to false will lock the user controls, and will unlock the controls if set to true.

member.summary: the key will be a field name in a class and the value will be its corresponding cell

member.name: M:Magna.DualTester.Domino.UI.Views.MainView.ViewMainUserOverView.FixCounts
member.summary: If any values under tester count are less than zero then the value will be set to zero.

member.name: T:Magna.DualTester.Domino.UI.Views.Settings.ApplicationSettingsView
member.summary: This is a parent user control that holds the ViewShiftSetup and ViewApplicaionParameters in a set of tabs.
member.remarks: This class shouldn't handle any user data it only controls a few user controls.

member.name: T:Magna.DualTester.Domino.UI.Views.Settings.SubViews.ViewShiftSetup
member.summary: This is one of the views that edits the config file for this application.

member.name: F:Magna.DualTester.Domino.UI.Views.Settings.SubViews.ViewShiftSetup._coms1
member.summary: holds a list of active com ports on this computer. Is bound to a list box for users to select.

member.name: M:Magna.DualTester.Domino.UI.Views.Settings.SubViews.ViewShiftSetup.Check(System.Windows.Forms.TextBox,System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex,System.String@)
member.summary: Used by the SaveConfig function to see if input strings are correct. And to highlight problem textboxes. Incorrect strings are nulled out and returned thru their reference.
member.param: Handing this in allows the highlighting of incorrect inputs
This is the pattern the string will be checked against
This is the string to be checked. This is a reference, the string can be modified so it should be used as the final output.
member.returns: -1 implies the string is blank. 0 implies the string is wrong. 1 implies the string is good.

member.name: M:Magna.DualTester.Domino.UI.Views.Settings.SubViews.ViewShiftSetup.TxtLabelRequestPath_TextChanged(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: This function checks to see if the text entered is a valid file directory every time focus is lost. If its not the textbox is turned yellow.
